summary: A man returns to a city to try to track down a lovely woman he met six years earlier.
cast: Pilar López de Ayala|Xavier Lafitte|Laurence Cordier|Tanja Czichy|Eric Dietrich|Charlotte Dupont|Coralie Audret|Françoise Félicité|Michaël Balerdi|Gladys Deussner|Philippe Ohrel
title: En la ciudad de Sylvia
